+++
title = "HackerRank Problem : Min Max Sum ( easy )"
slug = "2017-07-06-hackerrank-problem-min-max-sum-easy"
published = 2017-07-06T23:02:00.001000+05:30
author = "Krishankant Ray"
tags = []
+++
------------------------------------------------------------------------

  
<span style="color: red;">**<span
style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot; , sans-serif;">Problem :  
( </span>***<span
style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot; , sans-serif;"><span
style="color: black;"><span style="color: #d5a6bd;">Link </span>: [Click
here to visit this HackerRank problem
page.](https://www.hackerrank.com/challenges/mini-max-sum/problem)</span></span>***<span
style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot; , sans-serif;">
)</span>**</span>  
  
<span style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot; , sans-serif;">Given
five positive integers, find the minimum and maximum values that can be
calculated by summing exactly four of the five integers. Then print the
respective minimum and maximum values as a single line of two
space-separated long integers.</span>  

  
<span style="color: red;"><span
style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot; , sans-serif;">**Input
Format**</span></span>

  
<span style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot; , sans-serif;">A
single line of five space-separated integers.</span>

<span style="color: red;"><span
style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot; , sans-serif;">**Constraints**</span></span>

-   <span
    style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot; , sans-serif;">Each
    integer is in the inclusive range <span id="MathJax-Element-1-Frame"
    class="MathJax_SVG"
    style="display: inline-block; font-size: 100%;">![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)</span>.</span>

<span style="color: red;"><span
style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot; , sans-serif;">**Output
Format**</span></span>

<span style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot; , sans-serif;">Print
two space-separated long integers denoting the respective minimum and
maximum values that can be calculated by summing exactly *four* of the
five integers. (The output can be greater than 32 bit integer.)</span>

<span style="color: red;"><span
style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot; , sans-serif;">**Sample
Input**</span></span>

    1 2 3 4 5

     

<span style="color: red;"><span
style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot; , sans-serif;">**Sample
Output**</span></span>

    10 14

     

<span style="color: red;"><span
style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot; , sans-serif;">**Explanation**</span></span>

<span style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot; , sans-serif;">Our
initial numbers are <span id="MathJax-Element-1-Frame"
class="MathJax_SVG"
style="display: inline-block; font-size: 100%;">![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)</span>,
<span id="MathJax-Element-2-Frame" class="MathJax_SVG"
style="display: inline-block; font-size: 100%;">![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)</span>,
<span id="MathJax-Element-3-Frame" class="MathJax_SVG"
style="display: inline-block; font-size: 100%;">![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)</span>,
<span id="MathJax-Element-4-Frame" class="MathJax_SVG"
style="display: inline-block; font-size: 100%;">![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)</span>,
and <span id="MathJax-Element-5-Frame" class="MathJax_SVG"
style="display: inline-block; font-size: 100%;">![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)</span>.
We can calculate the following sums using four of the five
integers:</span>  
<span style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot; , sans-serif;">
</span>  

1.  <span style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot; , sans-serif;">If
    we sum everything except <span id="MathJax-Element-6-Frame"
    class="MathJax_SVG"
    style="display: inline-block; font-size: 100%;">![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)</span>,
    our sum is <span id="MathJax-Element-7-Frame" class="MathJax_SVG"
    style="display: inline-block; font-size: 100%;">![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)</span>.</span>
2.  <span style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot; , sans-serif;">If
    we sum everything except <span id="MathJax-Element-8-Frame"
    class="MathJax_SVG"
    style="display: inline-block; font-size: 100%;">![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)</span>,
    our sum is <span id="MathJax-Element-9-Frame" class="MathJax_SVG"
    style="display: inline-block; font-size: 100%;">![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)</span>.</span>
3.  <span style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot; , sans-serif;">If
    we sum everything except <span id="MathJax-Element-10-Frame"
    class="MathJax_SVG"
    style="display: inline-block; font-size: 100%;">![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)</span>,
    our sum is <span id="MathJax-Element-11-Frame" class="MathJax_SVG"
    style="display: inline-block; font-size: 100%;">![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)</span>.</span>
4.  <span style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot; , sans-serif;">If
    we sum everything except <span id="MathJax-Element-12-Frame"
    class="MathJax_SVG"
    style="display: inline-block; font-size: 100%;">![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)</span>,
    our sum is <span id="MathJax-Element-13-Frame" class="MathJax_SVG"
    style="display: inline-block; font-size: 100%;">![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)</span>.</span>
5.  <span style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot; , sans-serif;">If
    we sum everything except <span id="MathJax-Element-14-Frame"
    class="MathJax_SVG"
    style="display: inline-block; font-size: 100%;">![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)</span>,
    our sum is <span id="MathJax-Element-15-Frame" class="MathJax_SVG"
    style="display: inline-block; font-size: 100%;">![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)</span>.</span>

<span style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot; , sans-serif;">
</span><span
style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot; , sans-serif;">As you can
see, the minimal sum is <span id="MathJax-Element-16-Frame"
class="MathJax_SVG"
style="display: inline-block; font-size: 100%;">![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)</span>
and the maximal sum is <span id="MathJax-Element-17-Frame"
class="MathJax_SVG"
style="display: inline-block; font-size: 100%;">![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)</span>.
Thus, we print these minimal and maximal sums as two space-separated
integers on a new line.</span>  
<span style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot; , sans-serif;">
</span><span
style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot; , sans-serif;">**Hints:**
Beware of integer overflow! Use 64-bit Integer.</span>  
  
<span style="font-family: &quot;consolas&quot;;"><span
style="color: purple;"><span
style="color: black;">--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
</span></span></span>  
<span style="font-family: &quot;consolas&quot;;"><span
style="color: purple;"><span style="color: red;">Solution :</span> <span
style="color: black;">*(in C++ )*</span> </span></span>  
  
<span style="font-family: &quot;consolas&quot;;"><span
style="color: magenta;">#include</span> <span
style="color: #996600;">&lt;cmath></span>  
<span style="color: magenta;">#include</span> <span
style="color: #996600;">&lt;cstdio></span>  
<span style="color: magenta;">#include</span> <span
style="color: #996600;">&lt;vector></span>  
<span style="color: magenta;">#include</span> <span
style="color: #996600;">&lt;iostream></span>  
<span style="color: magenta;">#include</span> <span
style="color: #996600;">&lt;algorithm></span>  
<span style="color: magenta;">#include</span> <span
style="color: #996600;">&lt;cstdint></span>  
<span style="color: green;">using</span> <span
style="color: #9933ff;">namespace</span> <span
style="color: green;">std</span>;  
  
<span style="color: green;">int</span> <span
style="color: blue;">main</span>()  
{  
    <span style="color: green;">int64\_t</span> <span
style="color: blue;">arr</span>\[5\];  
    <span style="color: green;">int64\_t</span> <span
style="color: blue;">temp</span>, sum = 0;  
    <span style="color: #9933ff;">for</span> (<span
style="color: green;">int</span> <span
style="color: blue;">i</span> = 0; <span
style="color: green;">i</span> &lt; 5; <span
style="color: blue;">i</span>++)  
        cin >&gt; arr\[i\];  
    sort(arr, arr + 5);  
    <span style="color: #9933ff;">for</span> (<span
style="color: green;">int</span> <span
style="color: blue;">i</span> = 0; <span
style="color: green;">i</span> &lt; 4; <span
style="color: blue;">i</span>++) {  
        sum += arr\[i\];  
    }  
    cout &lt;&lt; sum &lt;&lt; <span
style="color: #996600;">" "</span>;  
    sum = 0;  
    <span style="color: #9933ff;">for</span> (<span
style="color: green;">int</span> <span
style="color: blue;">i</span> = 1; <span
style="color: green;">i</span> &lt; 5; <span
style="color: blue;">i</span>++) {  
        sum += arr\[i\];  
    }  
    cout &lt;&lt; sum;  
  
    <span style="color: #9933ff;">return</span> 0;  
}</span>
